articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Djokovic beats Nadal to keep Serbia alive in ATP Cup final
articles.description: Novak Djokovic recorded a straight-sets victory over long-time rival Rafael Nadal on Sunday to keep Serbia's hopes alive in the final of the inaugural ATP Cup team event in Sydney.
articles.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Novak Djokovic recorded a straight-sets victory over long-time rival Rafael Nadal on Sunday to keep Serbia’s hopes alive in the final of the inaugural ATP Cup team event in Sydney.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Restive Philippine volcano prompts evacuation of thousands of residents
articles.description: A volcano south of the Philippine capital Manila spewed a giant ash plume accompanied by rumbling sounds and tremors on Sunday, prompting authorities to raise the alert level and order the evacuation of about 8,000 residents.
articles.content:
MANILA (Reuters) - A volcano south of the Philippine capital Manila spewed a giant ash plume accompanied by rumbling sounds and tremors on Sunday, prompting authorities to raise the alert level and order the evacuation of about 8,000 residents.

articles.title: Philippines suspends Manila airport flights as volcano spews ash
articles.description: The Philippine airport authority on Sunday suspended flights at Manila's international airport after a volcano in nearby Batangas province spewed a giant plume of ash.
articles.content:
MANILA (Reuters) - The Philippine airport authority on Sunday suspended flights at Manila’s international airport after a volcano in nearby Batangas province spewed a giant plume of ash.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Golf: Australian Ormsby secures Hong Kong Open title
articles.description: Australian Wade Ormsby completed a wire-to-wire victory at the Hong Kong Open on Sunday as a final-round 66 lifted the Australian to the title for the second time in three years.
articles.content:
BANGKOK (Reuters) - Australian Wade Ormsby completed a wire-to-wire victory at the Hong Kong Open on Sunday as a final-round 66 lifted the Australian to the title for the second time in three years. 
Ormsby went into the final day with a two-shot lead over T… [+1265 chars]

articles.title: Friends and foes gather in Oman to mourn Qaboos
articles.description: World and regional leaders, many at odds with one another, met Oman's new ruler on Sunday to offer condolences for the death of Sultan Qaboos whose quiet diplomacy during five decades in power helped calm regional turbulence.

articles.title: Kipruto sets 10km road world record in Valencia
articles.description: Kenya's Rhonex Kipruto set a new 10km road world record as compatriot Sheila Chepkirui won the women's race at the 10K Valencia Ibercaja in Spain on Sunday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Kenya’s Rhonex Kipruto set a new 10km road world record as compatriot Sheila Chepkirui won the women’s race at the 10K Valencia Ibercaja in Spain on Sunday. 
World 10,000m bronze medallist Kipruto clocked 26 minutes 24 seconds to shave 14 seconds… [+1136 chars]

articles.title: Portuguese Goncalves dies after crash in Dakar Rally
articles.description: Portuguese rider Paulo Goncalves died following a crash in the seventh stage of the Dakar Rally in Saudi Arabia on Sunday, organisers said.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Portuguese rider Paulo Goncalves died following a crash in the seventh stage of the Dakar Rally in Saudi Arabia on Sunday, organisers said.

articles.title: Both sides accuse each other of violating ceasefire in Libya
articles.description: Both of Libya's warring factions accused each other of violating a ceasefire proposed by Turkey and Russia, as fighting continued around the capital, Tripoli, on Sunday.
articles.content:
TRIPOLI (Reuters) - Both of Libya’s warring factions accused each other of violating a ceasefire proposed by Turkey and Russia, as fighting continued around the capital, Tripoli, on Sunday.
